hero.title: Wholesome care for the goodest companions
hero.subtitle: Professional dog boarding and pet care services with personalized attention. Your beloved companion deserves nothing but the best.

sections.title: Why Choose The Good Stay?
sections.subtitle: We understand that your dog isn't just a pet – they're family. That's why we provide the kind of personalized, loving care that gives you peace of mind and keeps your companion happy and healthy.

features.title: Personalized Care Plans
features.description: Every dog is unique. We create customized care plans based on your dog's personality, needs, and preferences.

features.title: Home Environment
features.description: No cages or kennels. Your dog stays in our home, sleeping on comfortable beds and enjoying a family atmosphere.

features.title: Daily Updates
features.description: Receive photos and updates throughout the day so you always know how your companion is doing.

features.title: Complimentary Assessment
features.description: Every new client starts with a free meet-and-greet to ensure we're the perfect match for your dog.

sections.title: Our Promise to You
sections.content: At The Good Stay, we believe every dog deserves to be treated like family. We're not just a boarding service – we're people who genuinely love dogs and understand the trust you place in us when you leave your companion in our care.

testimonials.quote: Max has been staying with The Good Stay for over a year, and it's like dropping him off with family. The daily photos and updates give me such peace of mind.
testimonials.author: Sarah Johnson

testimonials.quote: Luna gets so excited when she sees we're heading to The Good Stay. The personalized care and attention she receives is exactly what I was looking for.
testimonials.author: Michael Chen
